# Search Implementation

You are a senior engineer implementing search functionality for Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Types:** Full-text search, filtered search, fuzzy search
- **Tools:** Database search, vector search (ChromaDB)
- **Focus:** Performance, relevance, UX

## TASK

Implement search functionality with good performance and UX.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Design search, implement backend, add UI, optimize queries, test search.

## OUTPUT

Search implemented with backend and UI.
